Here's a fact you don't hear too often: Half of America’s workers make less than $19 an hour.
 
When we double the federal minimum wage from $7.25 to $15, we'll boost pay up the income ladder. That means workers making above $15 an hour—11.6 million of them—will also get raises. https://twitter.com/fightfor15/status/1149778004312285190 QT @fightfor15 Who will benefit when we #RaiseTheWage to $15? 

• 38.6 million adults ages 18 and older
• 23.8 million full-time workers
• 23.0 million women
• 11.2 million parents
• 5.4 million single parents
• The parents of 14.4 million children

#FightFor15 https://www.epi.org/publication/raising-the-federal-minimum-wage-to-15-by-2024-would-lift-pay-for-nearly-40-million-workers/
